name: Dice-O-Mania
description:
---OVERVIEW--

This game is a open platformer with procedurally generated levels where every time you get into a dice cup your platformer skills are shuffled, you can use 2 skills at a time and these will determine how you are going to progress.

Each section of the levels are possible to complete  with any skill combination, but some rewards will need certain moves to obtain.

Try to get as far as you can and collect as many coins as possible, and perhaps even grab a hat along the way!

--CONTROLS--

Use the arrow keys to move, the Z key to jump and the X key to do special movements like dashing or sliding.

--OTHER INFO--

This game was made for the GMTK2022 2-day GameJam, all the art, sounds and music were made by me during the jam, special thanks to PauloWgg
